chapter.title: Supported Approaches to Dynamic Profiles
chapter.para: When dealing with the installation of multiple systems, it might be useful to use a single profile (or just a reduced set of them) adapts automatically to each system. In this regard, &ay; offers three different mechanisms to modify the profile at installation time.

listitem.para: Rules and classes offer the possibility to configure a system by merging multiple control files during installation. You can read more about this feature in the section.
&ay; supports Embedded Ruby (ERB) templates syntax to modify the profile's content during installation. The section describes how to use them.
You can use a pre-installation script to modify or even create a brand new profile during installation. describes how to benefit from them.
